short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and edit the attributes of an HTML element.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View and edit the attributes of HTML elements from the Chrome devtools.

Features:
- Add and remove attributes
- Change attribute keys
- Change attribute values
- Disable/enable attributes
